title: SQL server version control
body: I'm looking for open source sql server database version control addon/tools to link with Git. I tried gitSQL and red-gate sql source control (not an open source). With gitSQL I see a problem that when I try to export an object it seems to export dependencies as well. I would like to get some recommendations for good tools for sql server version control. Please suggest? I am using SQL Server Management studio 2014.
